text: L.A. Without a Map, also known as Los Angeles Without a Map and I Love L.A. is a 1998 French British Finnish Luxembourgian romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Mika Kaurismäki and was based on the 1988 semi-authobigraphical novel of the same name by Richard Rayner. It stars David Tennant, Vinessa Shaw, Julie Delpy, Vincent Gallo, Cameron Bancroft, Amanda Plummer, Steve Huison, Saskia Reeves, Robert Davi, Malcolm Tinney, Jerzy Skolimowski. ==Other websites== * Category:1998 comedy-drama movies Category:1998 romantic comedy movies Category:1998 romantic drama movies Category:1990s road movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Finnish movies Category:Luxembourgian romance movies Category:Luxembourgian comedy movies Category:Luxembourgian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mika Kaurismäki Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: L.A. Without a Map
